mapper.select: select EVENT_START as event_start, EVENT_END as event_end, EVENT_TITLE as event_title, EVENT_CONTENT as event_content, EVENT_WRITER as event_writer, EVENT_COLOR as event_color, EVENT_ID as event_id from s_calendar where STUDY_NO = #{study_no}
mapper.insert: insert into S_CALENDAR (STUDY_NO, CAL_NO, EVENT_ID, EVENT_START, EVENT_END, EVENT_WRITER, EVENT_TITLE, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_COLOR) values (#{study_no}, 1, CALEVENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{event_start}, #{event_end}, 'cj', #{event_title}, #{event_content}, #{event_color} )
